description: Usnar Mawuruf Vs Site Forest Officer and another. before Hon. Damith Thotawatte, J.
parties: Usnar Mawuruf Vs Site Forest Officer and another.
keywords: Article 154P(3)(b) of the Constitution, Section 10 of the State Lands Act, Ejectment order, Right of appeal — excluded by statute, Conversion of Appeal into Revision, Scope and Limits of Revisionary Jurisdiction.
